abstract: The Blackstone Group has acquired Harbourmaster Capital, a leveraged-loan manager based in Dublin that manages and advises on $11 billion of assets.
snippet: The Blackstone Group has acquired Harbourmaster Capital, a leveraged-loan manager based in Dublin that manages and advises on $11 billion of assets.
lead_paragraph: The Blackstone Group has acquired Harbourmaster Capital, a leveraged-loan manager based in Dublin that manages and advises on $11 billion of assets. Terms were not disclosed. The deal makes Blackstone's GSO Capital Partners one of the largest loan investors in Europe, as well as in the United States, the firm said. Read more »
